title: Sweet Jayne
description: From USA Today Bestselling author K Webster comes a dark psychological thriller! A girl was taken. Nadia saw it all… But remembers nothing. One Colorado cop has been hunting for answers regarding the disappearance of his younger sister for years. Every lead is a dead end. Each day that passes lessens his chances of finding her. She’s presumed dead. He thinks all is lost until he stumbles upon the only witness of the crime. Nadia Jayne. The young woman—with connections that go deep in their small town—resurfaces out of hiding and lands on his radar. Her secrets are plentiful—dark and twisted. He’ll stop at nothing, tearing apart her world until he finds what he’s looking His sister. But he might just dig a little too deep… He might uncover more than he bargained for. Perhaps sweet Jayne isn’t so sweet after all.
author: K. Webster
